CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PCDTBT (Poly[3,3'-bis(4-phenylenevinylene)benzothiadiazole])
2. PCDSeBT (Poly[3,3'-bis(4-phenylenevinylene)selenophenylene benzothiadiazole])
3. DSeBT (Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* PCDTBT
* PCDSeBT
* DSeBT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCDTBT
2. PCDSeBT

These are the two materials that are clearly mentioned as names in the paragraph. "DSeBT" is not a material name, but rather a monomer that is used to synthesize PCDSeBT.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCDTBT (Poly[N-9''-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)]
2. PCDSeBT (Poly[N-9''-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-selenophene)])
3. DSeBT (Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)

These are the names of the polymers and monomers mentioned in the paragraph, which are considered as "Property Name" entities.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCDTBT (Poly[N-9''-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole)])
2. PCDSeBT (Poly[N-9''-heptadecanyl-2,7-carbazole-alt-5,5-(4',7'-di-2-thienyl-2',1',3'-benzothiadiazole-selenophene)])

These two entities are the names of the polymers that are being discussed in the paragraph, and they are clearly relevant to the material property of the polymers.

I have removed the entity "DSeBT" (Diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) from the list, as it is not a material property, but rather a monomer that is used to synthesize the polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

These are the two polymers mentioned in the paragraph, and they are both relevant to the material property of the polymers.
